name: UrlBuilder_buildStreamUrlTest
description: Unit tests for the buildStreamUrl method in the UrlBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithEmptyStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method with an empty list of streams.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithSingleStream
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method with a single stream in the list.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithMultipleStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method with multiple streams in the list.

test_cases.name: testBuildStreamUrlWithNullStreams
test_cases.description: Tests the buildStreamUrl method with a null list of streams.
